Description: Canonical registry defining the closed set of discourse functions for the LOGOS externalization system. Each function governs deterministic multi-statement assembly over compiled statements without semantic inference or mutation.

EXPLANATION_CHAIN.Definition: Assembles an ordered sequence of compiled statements mirroring the dependency structure of the underlying meaning state. Ordering is the unique topological sort of the acyclic dependency graph with lexicographic tie-breaking on primitive term_id.
EXPLANATION_CHAIN.Semantic_Constraint: Does not derive, infer, or alter meaning. Arranges compiled statements by dependency order only.
EXPLANATION_CHAIN.PXL_Anchor: SI-05 Dependency Acyclicity; SR-04 depends_on; SR-01 grounds

ARGUMENT_FLOW.Definition: Presents compiled statements as a structured argument: premises, inference steps, and conclusion. Driven by the transformation chain recorded in the audit trail. Each step corresponds to a specific Transformation Type application with its PXL anchor.
ARGUMENT_FLOW.Semantic_Constraint: Does not derive, infer, or alter meaning. Orders compiled statements by audit trail transformation sequence only.
ARGUMENT_FLOW.PXL_Anchor: TT-01 through TT-10 transformation types; audit trail total order

PEDAGOGICAL_PROGRESSION.Definition: Graduated presentation of compiled statements in dependency order with explicit tier demarcation between dependency depth levels. Introduces concepts from foundational to derived with inserted boundary markers at each depth increment.
PEDAGOGICAL_PROGRESSION.Semantic_Constraint: Does not derive, infer, or alter meaning. Arranges compiled statements by dependency depth tiers only.
PEDAGOGICAL_PROGRESSION.PXL_Anchor: SI-05 Dependency Acyclicity; SR-04 depends_on; SR-01 grounds

CONTRASTIVE_STRUCTURE.Definition: Juxtaposes compiled statements representing differentiated semantic states. Enumerates contrastive pairs by differentiating attribute (truth value, scope, SSC classification, or proof status). Within pairs, affirmed/stronger/higher-SSC statement precedes negated/weaker/lower-SSC statement.
CONTRASTIVE_STRUCTURE.Semantic_Constraint: Does not derive, infer, or alter meaning. Arranges compiled statements by contrastive pairing only.
CONTRASTIVE_STRUCTURE.PXL_Anchor: SR-05 excludes; SR-06 compatible_with; SP-11 Scope; SI-06 Scope Boundedness

Invariants: Discourse functions are a closed and finite set
No function may derive, infer, or alter meaning
No function may mutate compiled statement content
All ordering rules are total deterministic functions
EXPLANATORY attachment is always terminal and non-composable
No additional discourse functions are permitted without reopening Layer 4 governance
